member.name: T:Pomelo.EntityFrameworkCore.MySql.Json.Microsoft.Design.Internal.MySqlJsonMicrosoftDesignTimeServices
member.summary: This is an internal API that supports the Entity Framework Core infrastructure and not subject to the same compatibility standards as public APIs. It may be changed or removed without notice in any release. You should only use it directly in your code with extreme caution and knowing that doing so can result in application failures when updating to a new Entity Framework Core release.

member.name: M:Pomelo.EntityFrameworkCore.MySql.Json.Microsoft.Extensions.Internal.MySqlInternalJsonMicrosoftPropertyExtensions.SetJsonChangeTrackingOptions(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IMutableProperty,System.Nullable{Pomelo.EntityFrameworkCore.MySql.Storage.Internal.MySqlJsonChangeTrackingOptions})
member.summary: This is an internal API that supports the Entity Framework Core infrastructure and not subject to the same compatibility standards as public APIs. member.name: T:Pomelo.EntityFrameworkCore.MySql.Json.Microsoft.Extensions.MySqlJsonMicrosoftPropertyExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for for MySQL-specific metadata.

member.name: M:Pomelo.EntityFrameworkCore.MySql.Json.Microsoft.Extensions.MySqlJsonMicrosoftPropertyExtensions.SetJsonChangeTrackingOptions(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IMutableProperty,System.Nullable{Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.MySqlCommonJsonChangeTrackingOptions})
member.summary: Sets specific change tracking options for this JSON property, that specify how inner properties or array elements will be tracked. Applies to simple strings, POCOs and DOM objects. Using `null` restores all defaults.
member.param: The JSON property to set the change tracking options for.
The change tracking option to configure for the JSON property.

member.name: M:Pomelo.EntityFrameworkCore.MySql.Json.Microsoft.Infrastructure.Internal.MySqlJsonMicrosoftOptionsExtension.ApplyServices(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: Adds the services required to make the selected options work. This is used when there is no external and EF is maintaining its own service provider internally. This allows database providers (and other extensions) to register their required services when EF is creating an service provider.
member.param: The collection to add services to.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.MySqlJsonMicrosoftDbContextOptionsBuilderExtensions.UseMicrosoftJson(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Infrastructure.MySqlDbContextOptionsBuilder,Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.MySqlCommonJsonChangeTrackingOptions)
member.summary: Use System.Text.Json to access MySQL JSON data.
member.param: The builder being used to configure MySQL.
Configures the context to use the specified change tracking option as the default for all JSON column mapped properties.
member.returns: The options builder so that further configuration can be chained.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.MySqlJsonMicrosoftDbContextOptionsBuilderExtensions.UseMicrosoftJson(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Infrastructure.MySqlDbContextOptionsBuilder,Pomelo.EntityFrameworkCore.MySql.Storage.Internal.MySqlJsonChangeTrackingOptions)
member.summary: This is an internal API that supports the Entity Framework Core infrastructure and not subject to the same compatibility standards as public APIs. It may be changed or removed without notice in any release. You should only use it directly in your code with extreme caution and knowing that doing so can result in application failures when updating to a new Entity Framework Core release.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.MySqlJsonMicrosoftPropertyBuilderExtensions.UseJsonChangeTrackingOptions(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Builders.PropertyBuilder,System.Nullable{Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.MySqlCommonJsonChangeTrackingOptions})
member.summary: Uses specific change tracking options for this JSON propery, that specify how inner properties or array elements will be tracked. Applies to simple strings, POCOs and DOM objects. Using `null` restores all defaults.
member.param: The builder for the property being configured.
The change tracking options to configure for the property.
member.returns: The same builder instance so that multiple calls can be chained.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.MySqlJsonMicrosoftServiceCollectionExtensions.AddEntityFrameworkMySqlJsonMicrosoft(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: Adds the services required for Microsoft JSON support (System.Text.Json) in Pomelo's MySQL provider for Entity Framework Core.
member.returns: The same service collection so that multiple calls can be chained.
